title: Epidemic Keratoconjunctivitis - EyeWiki
snippet: Of the available EKC testing methods, the most commonly used are cell cultures and immunoassays. Polymerase chain reaction (PCR) is another method that has been shown to be more accurate than the combination of cell cultures + immunoassays (CC-IFA).

title: EKC Enterprises - Your AV & Low Voltage Integrators
snippet: Trust EKC for your low voltage technology needs. Our professional team excels in design, installation, and integration services.

title: Preventing Epidemic Keratoconjunctivitis (EKC) | Conjunctivitis (Pink ...
snippet: Apr 15, 2024 Â· Epidemic Keratoconjunctivitis (EKC) is a highly contagious form of pink eye caused by adenoviruses. EKC causes severe inflammation of the conjunctiva and cornea and can result in vision loss. Clean and disinfect right away to prevent and control outbreaks in eye clinics.

title: Extreme Kids & Crew
snippet: Extreme Kids & Crew is a not-for-profit 501 (c)3 organization that provides play-spaces where children with disabilities and their families can connect, create and learn together in a judgement-free environment. Through arts- and play-based programming, kids discover their talents and forge friendships.

title: East Kings County Alumnae Chapter of Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc.
snippet: Chartered on April 28, 2007, East Kings County Alumnae Chapter proudly serves the eastern portion of Brooklyn, through enriching and award-winning programs and events. Our engaging educational development programs inspire excellence in our youth.
